headline.main: TEN U.S. WOMEN TO VISIT BRITAIN; Leaders in Various Fields to Be Invited to See War Con- ditions at First Hand TEN U.S. WOMEN TO VISIT BRITAIN

lead_paragraph: Ten American women, each outstanding in her own field, will be invited to visit England in the near future under the auspices of the British Government, to see at first hand the conditions under which women are living and working in Great Britain, it was announced yesterday.
abstract: discusses plans for U S women to study Brit women's living and working conditions; por
